thread.title: Bobby Bowden reflects on Steve Spurrier resigning

title: Bobby Bowden reflects on Steve Spurrier resigning
text: Bobby Bowden reflects on Steve Spurrier resigning OCT 13, 6:21 pm FOX Sports Florida's Paul Kennedy talks with legendary FSU coach Bobby Bowden about the surprising resignation of Steve Spurrier, his longtime rival in the classic showdowns between the Seminoles and the Gators. Seahawks have blown second-most fourth quarter leads since 2012 0 Comments You may use your Facebook account to add a comment on FoxSports.com , subject to Facebook's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy .
